name: Axe Beak
actions_desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
description: Axe beaks got their name from their sharp wedge-shaped beaks. They had strong necks and powerful legs, which they used to sprint at high speeds.[1][4]Axebeaks were faster runners than most horses.[2][note 1]Axe beaks were aggressive hunters and usually hunted during daytime. They were always prone to attack any unfamiliar creatures that approached them.[1][4]The main natural weapon an axe beak used in combat was its heavy and sharp beak.[1][4]Axe beaks were most commonly found in hills and grasslands,[5] but they were also common to the jungles of Chult and the Snout of Omgar.[6][7]Flocks of axe beaks were also believed to be protective of their young, rushing to its aid in case of danger.[8]The tortles of Ahoyhoy sometimes captured wild axe beaks to sell them to visitors.[9]
